text: Norman Chee Tah Liu is a Chinese-American business executive and a Senior Advisor at ICBC Leasing based in Beijing, China. He was formerly the Chairman, President & CEO of GE Commercial Aviation Services (GECAS) based in Singapore until December 2016. He was a veteran of GE Capital, a primary unit of General Electric to which GECAS is grouped. He took over the position at GECAS from Henry A. Hubschman in July 2009. Liu graduated from Yale and obtained an MBA from Harvard. ==References== ==External links== *GE Capital Bio Category:American people of Chinese descent Category:General Electric people Category:Living people Category:Harvard Business School alumni Category:Yale University alumni Category:Members of Committee of 100 Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Norman Liu
